Html:
Hi All,

 

I am receiving the following error while calling Razor.Parse Method. "The type initializer for 'RazorEngine.Razor' threw an exception."

I have created a project which references the razorengine.dll and System.Web.Razor.dll. 

Any ideas please?

 

Thanks,

Sree
You should be able to look at the inner exception to figure out what the problem is?
